title: SOLD - 1910 T218 lot of 23 athletes G-VG-ish
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1910 T218 lot of 23 athletes G-VG-ish
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I'm selling the pictured 23 card lot of T218 athletes - all Hassan and Mecca backs.  It's a nice lot of mid-grade-ish cards - no beauties but no beaters either.

$50 delivered - about $2 per card - how can you go wrong for that price for 100+ year old cards??

PM me if you want them - PayPal, check, any other payment forms you have likely will be accepted as well.

Thanks for looking!
Scott
